text: Allah ntiyari kurekera abemera muri ubu buryo muri mo, kugeza agaragaje ababi mu beza. Kandi Allah ntiyari kubahishurira ibitagaragara, cyakora Allah ahitamo uwo ashaka mu ntumwa ze (akaba ari we abihishurira). Ku bw’ibyo, nimwemere Allah n’intumwa ze. Kandi nimwemera mukanatinya Allah, muzagororerwa ibihembo bihambaye
